name: Destroy all boxes - Free
description:
Exciting and explosive point and click game. Examine the building and figure out which corner stone you need to destroy. Or search for pebbles that you can heat up and make a ball of fire. Get more bombs by destroying the crates on the level. Place several bombs at once to get a massive explosion. You can also build your own level and send it to your friends to challenge them.

Free version, NO pay to win. All features for free, NO accidental "in-app purchases".

How to make a fireball:

Place two bombs next to a small square stone. Aim well.
